TopicTitle: How to Make an in game tutorial?

Articles.Content:
So, with the rash of people asking for help with completing the rescue Kerbal contracts I had the idea to add an in game tutorial on how to go about rescuing a kerbal.

I of course have no idea how to do this and even if this would be very popular.

blizzy78 has made some tutorials using the in-game tutorial system, that would probably a good place to start

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/46232

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/41851
Contracts were a great opportunity to teach players, new and old. Unfortunately, they decided testing parts in absurd situations was a better idea.

I think people can get it from there.

Pretty much set the Kerbal as a target and fire the throttle.

Then fire retrograde from the Kerbal. Then use Kerbal's EVA to get into your spare seat. Then de-orbit and land.

Simple simple right?

I there really a need for tutorial?
